rules_text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever you cast a spell that targets enchanted player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until you exile another card with Curse of Marked Charts.
notes:
!u

BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
